bibl.bibl: Newport, George. 1845–7. On the natural history, anatomy and development of the oil beetle, Meloë, more especially of Meloë cicatricosus, Leach. First memoir. The natural history of Meloë. Second memoir. The history and general anatomy of Meloë, and its affinities, compared with those of the Strepsiptera and Anoplura, with reference to the connexion which exists between structure, function and instinct. [Read 18 November 1845 and 19 January 1847.Transactions of the Linnean Society of London 20 (1846–51): 297–357.
